products.name: terraform-ibm-powervs-catalog-powervs-sap-systems
products.label: SAP on secure Power Virtual Servers

flavors.label: SAP prepared PowerVS instances (non HA)
flavors.name: prepared-system-non-ha
flavors.usage:
module "sap_systems" {
  source                    = "https://cm.globalcatalog.cloud.ibm.com/api/v1-beta/offering/source//examples/ibm-catalog/prepared-system-solution?archive=tgz&kind=terraform&name=terraform-ibm-powervs-catalog-powervs-sap-infrastructure&version=1.0.5"
  ibmcloud_api_key          = var.ibmcloud_api_key
  prerequisite_workspace_id = var.prerequisite_workspace_id
  powervs_zone              = var.powervs_zone
  prefix                    = var.prefix
  ssh_private_key           = var.ssh_private_key
}

features.description: 1 for SAP HANA, 0,1,2,... for SAP NetWeaver, 0 or 1 for shared SAP files
features.title: PowerVS instances

diagram.caption: Basic SAP system landscape in IBM PowerVS environment prepared for SAP system installation on a secure infrastructure on VPC and extended by Power Virtual Servers

diagrams.description:
'SAP prepared PowerVS instances (non HA)' variation of 'SAP on secure Power Virtual Servers' creates a basic and expandable SAP system landscape builds on the foundation of the 'Secure infrastructure on VPC for regulated industries' and 'Power infrastructure for regulated industries'. PowerVS instances for SAP HANA, SAP NetWeaver and optionally for shared SAP files are deployed and preconfigured for SAP installation.

Services such as DNS, NTP and NFS running in VPC and provided by 'Power infrastructure for regulated industries' are 
leveraged.

Redundant IBM Cloud Connections provide the network bridge between the IBM Power infrastructure and the IBM VPC and public internet.

The resulting SAP landscape leverages the services such as Activity Tracker, Cloud Object Storage, Key Management from the 'Secure infrastructure on VPC for regulated industries' and the network connectivity configuration provided by 'Power infrastructure for regulated industries'.

flavors.label: SAP system on PowerVS instances (non HA)
flavors.name: s4hana-bw4hana-non-ha
flavors.usage:
module "sap_systems" {
  source                    = "https://cm.globalcatalog.cloud.ibm.com/api/v1-beta/offering/source//examples/ibm-catalog/prepared-system-solution?archive=tgz&kind=terraform&name=terraform-ibm-powervs-catalog-powervs-sap-infrastructure&version=1.0.5"
  ibmcloud_api_key          = var.ibmcloud_api_key
  prerequisite_workspace_id = var.prerequisite_workspace_id
  powervs_zone              = var.powervs_zone
  prefix                    = var.prefix
  ssh_private_key           = var.ssh_private_key
}

features.description: 1 SAP S4/HANA system or 1 SAP BW4/HANA system or 1 SAP Solution Manager system
features.title: SAP system

features.description: 1 for SAP HANA, 1 for SAP NetWeaver, 0 or 1 for shared SAP files
features.title: PowerVS instances

diagram.caption: Ready-to-use SAP system (non HA) in existing IBM PowerVS environment

diagrams.description:
'SAP system on PowerVS instances (non HA)' variation of 'SAP on secure Power Virtual Servers' creates a ready-to-use SAP system in an existing IBM PowerVS environment build on the foundation of the 'Secure infrastructure on VPC for regulated industries' and 'Power infrastructure for regulated industries'. PowerVS instances for SAP HANA, SAP NetWeaver and optionally for shared SAP files are deployed, preconfigured and SAP system is installed.

Services such as DNS, NTP and NFS running in VPC and provided by 'Power infrastructure for regulated industries' are 
leveraged.

Redundant IBM Cloud Connections provide the network bridge between the IBM Power infrastructure and the IBM VPC and public internet.

The resulting SAP landscape leverages the services such as Activity Tracker, Cloud Object Storage, Key Management from the 'Secure infrastructure on VPC for regulated industries' and the network connectivity configuration provided by 'Power infrastructure for regulated industries'.
